sentences.en: A ratchet mechanism transfers the thread from spool to bobbin.
sentences.cn: 一种棘齿装置把线从线轴转到梭心上。

sentences.en: Chains and Chain Link Fence Fittings, Ratchet, Winch, Winch Bars, Chain, Wire.
sentences.cn: 采购产品链和链环,围栏配件, 棘轮, 绞车, 绞车酒吧, 链条, 钢丝.

sentences.en: Double - dog ratchet prevents shoe spring - back during bends; allows fast release after bending.
sentences.cn: 双 棘齿 机构防止弯管过程中压模弹回,且有利于弯管结束后快速松脱.

sentences.en: Everybody expects to be above average, so you get this ratchet effect.
sentences.cn: 而每个人都期望超越平均水平, 这样就产生了棘轮效应.

sentences.en: He fears inflation will ratchet up as the year ends.
sentences.cn: 他害怕通货膨胀会在年终更加严重。

sentences.en: Obviously, the regular crimp wave provides a mechanism for short - range entanglement of the ratchet type.
sentences.cn: 虽然, 有规则的卷曲波纹能使纤维间短片段内彼此纠缠接触,产生棘轮式机械作用.

sentences.en: Ratchet I sense the deceptions are getting ready to mobilize.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到霸天虎已经开始行动了.

sentences.en: Ratchet: I sense deceptions are getting ready to mobilize.
sentences.cn: 救护车: 我感觉到霸天虎已经起头行动了.

sentences.en: Ratchet: I sense the deceptions aremobilize.
sentences.cn: 救护车: 我感觉到霸天虎已经开始行动了.

sentences.en: Ratchet: New form; Emergency vehicle; Medical & Science officer; Repairs Transformers injured in battle.
sentences.cn: 救护车: 新形态; 抢险车; 医师 兼 科技官; 负责修理战斗中负伤的变形金刚.

sentences.en: The Bilgewater Port offers transportation to Kul'Tiras and Ratchet.
sentences.cn: 漏水港提供了通往库尔提拉斯和棘齿城的航线.

sentences.en: The chair has a ratchet below it to adjust the height.
sentences.cn: 这把椅子下面有棘轮调整高度。

sentences.en: The Ratchet bank now has access to the Guild Vault.
sentences.cn: 棘齿城现在也有公会银行了.

sentences.en: We must make sure that the business - custom relationship is a profit ratchet.
sentences.cn: 我们必须确保商业与顾客的关系成为不可逆转的利润增长手段.

sentences.en: We're trying to ratchet down the administrative costs.
sentences.cn: 我们正在想法控制管理成本。

trans.tran_en: a machine part consisting of a wheel or bar with teeth on it, which allows movement in only one direction
